question: Do you enjoy learning about different academic subjects without focusing on just one field?
Are you good at adapting to various kinds of tasks in math, science, and humanities?
Would you enjoy spending time exploring different subjects, projects, or research?
Do you see yourself pursuing flexible career paths like teaching, management, or communication?
Do you prefer working in an environment that allows variety and flexibility in tasks?
Do you enjoy learning about business, finance, and entrepreneurship?
Are you good at organizing, problem-solving, or analyzing numbers?
Would you enjoy spending time making business plans, analyzing cases, or leading group activities?
Do you see yourself working in careers related to business, accounting, or management?
Do you prefer working in an environment that involves planning, decision-making, and teamwork?
Do you enjoy learning about society, culture, communication, and people’s behavior?
Are you good at reading, writing, speaking, or analyzing human interactions?
Would you enjoy spending time debating, writing essays, or conducting interviews?
Do you see yourself working in careers like teaching, law, psychology, or journalism?
Do you prefer working in environments focused on people, communities, and communication?
Do you enjoy learning about customer service, communication, and business support?
Are you good at speaking, problem-solving, and assisting others?
Would you enjoy spending time talking to customers, answering questions, or resolving issues?
Do you see yourself working as a call center agent, customer service rep, or support staff?
Do you prefer working in environments that involve interaction and communication with clients?
Which of the following would you most enjoy doing in your future career?

options.label: A
options.text: Analyzing people’s behavior, exploring culture, and communicating ideas through teaching, law, psychology, or journalism (HUMSS)

options.label: B
options.text: Assisting customers, solving problems, and providing professional support in service-oriented industries (ICT CCS)

question: Do you enjoy learning about science, math, and problem-solving?
Are you good at analyzing data, solving equations, or doing experiments?
Would you enjoy spending time working on research, projects, or science investigations?
Do you see yourself working in careers related to engineering, medicine, or scientific research?
Do you prefer working in environments that involve analysis, research, and innovation?
Do you enjoy learning about coding, algorithms, and system development?
Are you good at logical thinking, problem-solving, and creating digital solutions?
Would you enjoy spending time writing programs, solving coding challenges, or testing apps?
Do you see yourself working as a programmer, software developer, or systems analyst?
Do you prefer working in environments focused on innovation and software development?
Do you enjoy learning about computers, gadgets, and electronics?
Are you good at fixing devices, troubleshooting, or assembling computer parts?
Would you enjoy spending time repairing gadgets or upgrading hardware systems?
Do you see yourself working as a technician, IT support, or hardware specialist?
Do you prefer working in environments involving technology repair and maintenance?
Which of the following would you most enjoy doing in your future career?

options.label: A
options.text: Designing experiments, solving equations, and applying science/math in fields like engineering, medicine, or research (STEM)

options.label: B
options.text: Creating programs, coding apps, and developing digital solutions for real-world problems (ICT-CP)

options.label: C
options.text: Assembling, repairing, and troubleshooting computers, gadgets, and hardware systems (ICT-HW)

question: Do you enjoy learning about drawing, graphics, and motion design?
Are you good at creating illustrations, digital art, or storytelling through visuals?
Would you enjoy spending time making animated videos, characters, or graphics?
Do you see yourself working as an animator, illustrator, or multimedia artist?
Do you prefer working in creative environments involving design and media production?
Do you enjoy learning about design, layouts, and visual creativity?
Are you good at using design tools, editing, or creating graphics?
Would you enjoy spending time designing posters, logos, or digital artwork?
Do you see yourself working as a graphic designer, visual artist, or creative media specialist?
Do you prefer working in environments where design and creativity are essential?
Which of the following would you most enjoy doing in your future career?

options.label: A
options.text: Bringing characters, stories, and visuals to life through animation and motion design (ICT Animation)

options.label: B
options.text: Designing layouts, logos, posters, and visual branding materials for creative projects (ICT Visual Graphics)

question: Do you enjoy learning about cooking, food preparation, and culinary arts?
Are you good at following recipes, experimenting with flavors, or presenting dishes?
Would you enjoy spending time in the kitchen preparing meals or running food-related projects?
Do you see yourself working in careers like chef, cook, or food entrepreneur?
Do you prefer working in an environment like kitchens, restaurants, or food labs?
Do you enjoy learning about hospitality, food service, and customer care?
Are you good at communicating with people, assisting guests, or organizing service tasks?
Would you enjoy spending time serving food, assisting in restaurants, or helping guests in hotels?
Do you see yourself working in careers related to hotels, restaurants, or food service industries?
Do you prefer working in environments that involve customer interaction, food service, and hospitality?
Do you enjoy learning about hotel management, housekeeping, and guest services?
Are you good at organizing spaces, maintaining cleanliness, or providing customer assistance?
Would you enjoy spending time managing hotel rooms, ensuring orderliness, or assisting in hotel operations?
Do you see yourself working in careers related to hotel operations, lodging management, or housekeeping?
Do you prefer working in environments that involve hospitality management, organization, and service?
Do you enjoy learning about tourism, events planning, and travel services?
Are you good at organizing activities, assisting people, and handling responsibilities?
Would you enjoy spending time planning tours, creating itineraries, or managing events?
Do you see yourself working in careers related to tourism, events, or travel agencies?
Do you prefer working in an environment that involves travel, events, and customer service?
Which of the following would you most enjoy doing in your future career?

options.label: A
options.text: Preparing meals, experimenting with flavors, and building a career in the culinary arts (HECF)

options.label: B
options.text: Assisting guests, serving food, and providing excellent hospitality in hotels and restaurants (HEHRS)

options.label: C
options.text: Managing hotel rooms, ensuring cleanliness, and organizing hotel operations (HEHO)

options.label: D
options.text: Planning tours, organizing events, and creating memorable travel experiences (HETEM)
